RCAIDE.Library.Methods.Mission.Segments.Vertical_Flight package

Submodules

RCAIDE.Library.Methods.Mission.Segments.Vertical_Flight.Climb module

RCAIDE.Library.Methods.Mission.Segments.Vertical_Flight.Climb.initialize_conditions(segment)[source]

Sets the specified conditions which are given for the segment type.

Assumptions: Climb segment with a constant rate of climb.

Source: N/A

Inputs: segment.altitude_start [meters] segment.altitude_end [meters] segment.climb_rate [meters/second] segment.state.numerics.dimensionless.control_points [Unitless] segment.state.conditions.frames.inertial.time [seconds]

Outputs: conditions.frames.inertial.velocity_vector [meters/second] conditions.frames.inertial.position_vector [meters] conditions.freestream.altitude [meters] conditions.frames.inertial.time [seconds]

Properties Used: N/A
